name: Wireless Charger
description: A fast and efficient wireless charging pad that supports all Qi-enabled devices. Compact and lightweight design makes it easy to carry on the go. Comes with overcharge protection to keep your devices safe.
comments: Works great but gets a bit warm after extended use.

name: Power Bank
description: A portable 10000mAh power bank that ensures your devices never run out of power. Features dual USB ports for simultaneous charging and a sleek design that fits in your pocket.
comments: Charges my phone multiple times without needing a recharge.
A bit heavy, but works great!

name: Apple Lightning to USB Cable 0.5m
description: A durable and fast-charging Apple-certified cable that ensures a stable connection. Perfect for data transfer and charging on the go. Its compact size makes it ideal for travel.

name: Car Charger
description: A fast car charger with 30W output. Ideal for charging smartphones and tablets during road trips. Includes overheat and overcharge protection.
comments: Affordable, but quality could be better.

name: Wireless Charging Dock
description: A 3-in-1 wireless charging dock that can charge your phone, earbuds, and smartwatch simultaneously. Designed with sleek materials to complement any desk setup.

name: Tempered Glass Screen Protector
description: A scratch-resistant tempered glass screen protector that provides crystal-clear display and durability. Easy to install with bubble-free adhesive.

name: Anti-Glare Screen Film
description: A premium screen film that reduces glare and fingerprint smudges. Perfect for outdoor use, ensuring optimal screen visibility in bright conditions.

name: Privacy Screen Protector
description: A privacy screen protector that ensures no one can see your screen from the side. Keeps your information private in public places.
comments: Makes the screen a bit darker.

name: Full-Coverage Glass Screen Protector
description: A full-coverage glass screen protector with curved edges for maximum protection. Keeps your screen safe from scratches and drops.

name: Matte Finish Screen Protector
description: An anti-reflective matte finish screen protector that provides a smooth touch and reduces glare. Ideal for gaming and outdoor use.

name: Silicone Phone Case
description: A durable and shockproof silicone phone case that provides excellent protection without adding bulk. Designed to absorb impact from drops and bumps.

name: Leather Wallet Case
description: This premium leather wallet case offers both protection and functionality. It comes with multiple card slots, making it a convenient choice for those who like to travel light.
comments: Very handy with the card slots.
Protects my phone and looks classy.

name: Clear Phone Case
description: A transparent case that offers basic protection while showing off the original design of your phone. Lightweight and slim for easy handling.
comments: Love that it shows the phone’s design.

name: Rugged Armor Case
description: Military-grade rugged armor case designed to withstand harsh environments. Ideal for those who need extra protection for their phone.
comments: A bit heavy but very protective.

name: Slim Fit Case
description: A minimalistic phone case that offers protection without adding bulk. Ideal for users who prefer lightweight and sleek designs.
comments: Great for those who don’t like bulky cases.
Not very protective but looks great.

name: Bluetooth Headphones
description: Noise-canceling wireless headphones with premium sound quality. Perfect for music lovers and those who need to focus in noisy environments.
comments: A bit pricey, but worth it.

name: Wireless Earbuds
description: Compact wireless earbuds with deep bass and long battery life. Comes with a charging case for convenience.

name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: A portable speaker with powerful sound and deep bass. Perfect for parties and outdoor use.
comments: A bit expensive but worth it.

name: Noise-Canceling Earphones
description: Comfortable earphones with active noise cancellation. Ideal for traveling and noisy environments.

name: Over-Ear Headphones
description: Comfortable over-ear headphones with excellent sound quality. Ideal for long listening sessions.

name: Car Mount
description: A magnetic car mount holder that keeps your phone secure while driving. Easy to install and adjust.

name: Smartphone Tripod
description: An adjustable tripod designed for smartphones. Ideal for photography and video recording.

name: Adjustable Phone Stand
description: A versatile desktop phone stand with adjustable height and angle. Ideal for watching videos or attending virtual meetings hands-free.
comments: Very practical and easy to use.

name: Wall Mount Holder
description: A phone holder that can be mounted on walls or other surfaces. Great for hands-free usage at home or in the office.
comments: Great for mounting in the gym.

name: Bicycle Phone Mount
description: A durable phone mount for bicycles, allowing easy access to your phone during rides. Adjustable to fit most phone sizes.
comments: Stays secure even on bumpy roads.
